item.description:
If you are attending the Portland Flower Show, LisaF will be giving the following lecture/slideshow at 3pm on Saturday.  The theme of this year's show is Enchanted Earth.

-----------------

Show details and registration can be found here: http://portlandcompany.com/flower/

It looks like tickets range from $12-$15 and volunteer opportunities are available.
item.how_to_find_us: One of the breakout sessions at the Portland Flower Show

group.name: Portland Maine Permaculture & The Resilience Hub

item.name: Beware of Falling Food: Intro to Permaculture (at Portland Flower Show)
